title: Contact Us
subtitle: Have a question or need support? We're here to help! Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: Multiple ways to reach our team

supportHours.title: Support Hours
supportHours.timezone: All times are in Central European Time (CET)

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...
form.agreement: By submitting this form, you agree to our

responseTime.question: How quickly do you respond to support requests?
responseTime.answer: We aim to respond to all support requests within 24 hours during business days. Critical issues are addressed within 4 hours.

phoneSupport.question: Do you offer phone support?
phoneSupport.answer: Yes! Phone support is available for Business plan subscribers during our business hours. Email support is available for all users.

demo.question: Can I schedule a demo?
demo.answer: Absolutely! Contact us to schedule a personalized demo of Schedfy's features and see how it can benefit your business.

implementation.question: Do you provide implementation assistance?
implementation.answer: Yes, we offer onboarding assistance and implementation support to help you get started quickly and efficiently with Schedfy.

messages.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
messages.error: Failed to send message. Please try again or contact us directly.
